message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product at a competitive price of $14,000. I believe it will be of great value to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. Would you consider selling it to me for $12,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is below my minimum.  I could let it go for $13,500. I'm confident it's a fair price considering the value it brings.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to propose an offer of $12,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
